title: J.O.P.A.R.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player with a regular Powerful attack. This ability will fail if the target hasn't voted for another player. As such, if you visit someone who ain't ever voted before, you'll just heal 'em up like a Doctor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you attack someone who's taken a life in the past, your attack power is upgraded to **Overkill**.
- Anyone who tries to do something suspicious at night, such as a murder, poison or framing, will be told that the J.O.P.A.R. is **looming** over them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: If the Good faction hangs more than three people, you have to eliminate them. Less, and you'll have to eliminate REFS.
